ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In them are two gushing springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: In them will be two gushing springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In these there will also be two springs gushing forth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In the Gardens are two springs, overflowing with abundance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: In them (both) will be two springs Naddakhatan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: In both of them are two springs gushing forth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: therein two fountains of gushing water --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: In both of them live springs gush forth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: In which will be two fountains gushing forth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: In both of them will be two gushing springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In them (each) will be two Springs pouring forth water in continuous abundance:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: In them (both) will be two springs gushing forth water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Therein are two gushing fountains of water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In them are two gushing springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: In both of them are two springs, spouting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:66] In both of them will be two gushing fountains, rushing with water, unceasing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Wherein) in the Gardens (are two abundant springs) and it is said: springs full of goodness, grace, mercy and bestowal of honour and much more from Allah.
